name: Prozwee Model Craft Hand Saw Kit(with 7PCS Saw Blades),Modeling Knife Hacksaw Tool,DIY Mini Razor Saw Kit for Handcrafted, DIY models and Other Fine Cutting
short_description: Essential for model builder: To better build models or dismantle old ones, you only need one set of tools —— LitKiwi Model Hand Saw Kit; Whether it's simple disassembly and trimming or professional model cutting, this kit will let you get the job done

Ergonomic handle: For handmade, comfort is the most important thing; Therefore, our handle is made of rubber wrapped to create, and the design of non-slip pattern at the fulcrum point of force, both comfortable and safe, ergonomic design allows you to use even for a long time will not lead to strain

Light but powerful: You may be worried whether such a lightweight blade is easy to damage? We answer you very clearly, no. The thickened design of the blade is more durable than other model saws on the market, not easy to bend and break, and we provide you with 7 shapes of saw blades, you can choose the blade you need to use according to the work scenario

Convenient and easy: Installation is simple and quick, just loosen the metal chuck and you can easily remove the saw blade and replace it; It should be noted that you need to double check whether the chuck has been tightened before use, otherwise the blade will easily run off and cause injury

Great value set: You will receive 1 sawholder and 7pcs blades, enough number and types of blades to meet your different needs; Please ensure personal safety during operation and do not attempt to cut materials that are too hard
product_description: ★ Model Craft Hand Saw Kit ★ ★ Features: ——Whether it's simple disassembly and trimming or professional model cutting, this kit will let you get the job done. ——Our handle is made of rubber wrapped to create, and the design of non-slip pattern at the fulcrum point of force, both comfortable and safe, ergonomic design allows you to use even for a long time will not lead to strain. ——The thickened design of the blade is more durable than other model saws on the market, not easy to bend and break ——Installation is simple and quick, just loosen the metal chuck and you can easily remove the saw blade and replace it. Note:you need to double check whether the chuck has been tightened before use, otherwise the blade will easily run off and cause injury. ★ Attention: 1.Due to the different monitor and light effect, the actual color of the item might be slightly different from the color showed on the pictures. 2.Please allow little measuring deviation due to manual measurement. ★ Package Include: You will receive 1 sawholder and 7pcs blades, enough number and types of blades to meet your different needs.

name: Hand Saw Woodworking Tools, 6-Inch Pull Saw, Flexible Double-Edge Blade 17/11 TPI, Japanese Flush Cut for DIY Craft, Non-Slip Wood Handle, Sharp & Lightweight for Woodworking and Garden Trim
short_description: Craftsman's Essential Hand Saw: Frocopo hand saw offers precision and durability, making it the ideal choice for craftsmen. Featuring a high-quality blade and ergonomic handle, it ensures smooth and accurate cuts for woodwork, carpentry, and DIY projects

3-ided Hardened Teeth: The handsaw is made from premium SK5 steel, featuring an innovative triple-ground, quenched, and hardened tooth design for unmatched sharpness and flexibility. This ensures smoother cutting surfaces for precise and efficient cuts

Double Edged: Frocopo 6-inch flexible double edge hand saw features a unique double-sided blade: 11 tpi coarse teeth on one side for quick cuts and 17 tpi fine teeth on the other side for smoother finishes. Hand saw ideal for a variety of cutting tasks

Lightweight and Effortless: The hand saw features a premium wooden handle and is at just 2.82 ounces. It won't cause fatigue even during extended use, making it the perfect assistant for quick and precise cuts, helping you create perfect pieces anytime

Lifetime Warranty: As a professional woodworking brand, Frocopo offers a lifetime warranty and comprehensive problem-solving services to ensure your satisfaction. Feel free to contact us anytime for assistance

name: Jig Saw Corded: DEKOPRO Electric Jigsaw Tool Power Jig Saws for Woodworking, Wood Cutter Hand Tool with 6 Variable Speed, 4 Orbital Settings, ±45° Bevel Cutting, Tool-less Blade Quick Release
short_description: [POWER MOTOR] Max 3,000 SPM corded jig saws for all kinds of wood cutting. Featuring variable speed control that adjusts the cutting speed to suit the blade and application, the jigsaw allows for a precise finish and provides the power you need to make the majority of cuts for your DIY or beginner woodworking projects.

[TOOL-LESS BLADE CLAMP & BEVEL CUTTING] The electric wood cutter with the tool-less saw blade clamp, saw blades can be changed quickly without tools. Sturdy metal base plate adjusts to 0°, 15°, 30° and 45° for different bevel cutting needs.

[4 ORBITAL SETTINGS] Jigsaw with 4-position orbital settings allow for smooth cutting for a variety of applications. The higher orbital setting is suitable for softer materials and faster cutting; lower for harder materials and slower cutting.

[PRECISE CUTTING] A vacuum hose(not included) can be attached directly to the dust port adapter to give you a clear view of the workpiece being sawed so you can easily follow the cut line. The parallel guide enables you to saw parallel cuts.
[PACKAGE INCLUDED] The corded Jig Saw Kit is 1 x jigsaw, 1 x Replaceable wood blade, 1 x Parallel guide Ruler, 1 x Dust-blowing port adapter, 1 x Allen wrench, and 1 x User manual.

name: Saker Mini Chainsaw,Portable Electric Chainsaws Cordless,Handheld Chain Saw Pruning Shears Chain Saws for Tree Branches,Courtyard,Household and Garden,Gift for Men Dad Husband Women
short_description: 🎁 Mini Chainsaw Cordless Perfect Tool for Dad, Mom, Friends, Husband, DIYer 🎁

【STRONG DYNAMIC SYSTEM】 - Saker Mini Chainsaw adapts a high-quality guide chain that has undergone a deep quenching process to ensure smooth cutting. In addition, a pure copper motor is used, which is very powerful. cutting efficiency is higher and faster.

【UPGRADED COPPER MOTOR & CHAIN & BAR】 - Provides your tool with longer run-time, more torque, and more power which leads to extend the lifetime of the mini chain saw. The chain and guide bar are consumable parts - replace them according to the illustrated steps in the manual and product page for proper operation.

【LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE】 - Saker Mini Chainsaw weighs only 1.1 kg (including battery) and has a total length of 4 inches. Saker cordless mini chainsaw can be used with one hand, and it is not easy to get tired after long-term use. It is very suitable for family and temporary work, even the elderly can easily control it.

【RECHARGEABLE ELECTRIC CHAINSAW】 - The Saker mini electric chainsaw is equipped with a 20V 1500mAh rechargeable lithium battery, which can be used for a long time. Charging at any time, convenient and fast.If you do not use it for a long time, please remember to fully charge the battery first, for a better experience the next time you use it. For best performance, fully charge until the indicator turns green before first use. If storing long-term, keep fully charged and recharge periodically

【SAFE OPERATION】The safety lock must be pressed before starting using mini chain saw cordless, and then small chain saw is used while pressing the trigger, so there is no need to worry about accidental injury. Saker mini chainsaw includes a protective cover for wood chip protection and a hand guard for safe operation.

【EASY TO CARRY 】- Small and convenient, quick and easy to assemble, just need 1 minute for all install.Smartsaker handheld chainsaw is also convenient for women. You can get a 4inch chainsaw, a battery, a charger, a small bottle of lubricating oil, a screwdriver and a wrench.
【NOTE】-To extend the lifespan of the motor, if the machine gets hot, please wait until it has completely cooled down before continuing to use the chainsaw.

【SERVICE】- We are confident in the quality of the product. In the process of daily use, if the mini cordless chainsaw has quality problems or have any questions about the power chain saws, please contact us at any time, we are always there.

[LED LIGHT & 3 ORBITAL SETTINGS] Cordless Jigsaw with LED light that illuminates dark areas to ensure improved visibility and cutting accuracy in different work bench. 3-position orbital settings allow for smooth cutting for a variety of applications.

name: DEWALT 20V MAX Jig Saw, Tool Only (DCS331B)
short_description: All-metal, lever-action, keyless blade change allows for quick and easy blade changes
All-metal, keyless shoe bevel with detents at 0 degree, 15 degree, 30 degree, and 45 degree provides versatility for easy bevel cutting
4-position orbital action provides control of cut quality and speed for the jigsaw tool
Adjustable dust blower keeps line of cut clear of chips
Variable speed 0-3,000 spm for versatility in a multitude of materials and applications
Anti-slip comfort grip for increased comfort and control
Accepts T-shank jig saw blades for optimal holding power and professional results
All-metal keyless shoe bevel with detents at 0Degree, 15Degree, 30Degree and 45Degree provides versatility for easy bevel cutting
All-metal lever-action keyless blade change
Variable speed 0-3,000 spm for versatility
Adjustable dust blower
product_description: This 20V MAX* Jig Saw has an all metal, lever-action keyless blade clamp designed for quick and easy blade changes and an all-metal keyless shoe bevel with four detents at 0 degree, 15 degree, 30 degree, and 45 degree to make bevel adjustments easy. The variable-speed trigger of the cordless jigsaw provides up to 3,000 strokes per minute to easily adjust speeds during cutting and 4-position orbital action for wood cutting. A removable shoe cover helps protect materials from scratches and the dust blower helps users see where they're cutting. Battery and charger sold separately.

name: Jigsaw Compatible With Dewalt 20v Max Battery, Cordless jig saw tool Brushless Motor, 0°- 45° Bevel Cuts, LED Light with 3 Position Orbital Setting for Straight/Curve/Bevel/Circle Cutting (NO Battery)
short_description: Brushless Motor & Cordless Powered: With powerful brushless motor, the jigsaw compatible with Dewalt features a heat resistance low voltage and overload protection. The jigsaw generate power output 750w up to 2900 rpm for efficiency performance. Designed for cordless operation, The jig saw is compatible with Dewalt 18v 20v max battery such as DCB201 DCB202 DCB203 DCB204 DCB205 DCB206, offering portability and flexibility for use in confined spaces or tough projects

Adjustable Bevel Cutting & 3-Position Orbital Action: With an adjustable base pedal design, this power jigsaw tool can easily achieve 0 - 45 degree bevel cuts on the left and right, providing versatile cutting options. The 3-position orbital action (0-2) ensures high cutting efficiency for different materials, including wood, plywood, soft steel, and plastics. Whether you need straight cuts, curved cuts, circle cuts or angled cuts, this cordless jigsaw tool delivers exceptional performance

Tool-Free Blade Change & Safety Lock: Quickly and easily change High-speed steel blades with the tool-free, lever-action design, saving you time and effort. The built-in safety lock off button ensures safe operation, preventing accidental activation and reducing the risk of injury. This jigsaw tool compatible with dewalt is designed with user safety and convenience in mind

Dust Protective Shroud & Built-In LED Work Light: The jigsaw compatible with dewalt features a transparent dust shroud to minimize dust splash and maintain visibility during cutting. Equipped with a bright LED work light, it illuminates dark or dimly lit workspaces, ensuring precision and ease of use

Versatile Applications & Comprehensive Package: This jigsaw is designed to excel in multiple cutting tasks, thanks to its compatibility with various T-Shank blades. Whether you're working on wood, metal, or plastics, this cordless jigsaw tool is a reliable choice for both home improvement owners and professional lumber workers. The package includes: jigsaw *1, T-Shank Blade for Wood (3.9" & 5.9") *4, T-Shank Blade for Metal *2, Screwdriver *1, Instruction Manual *1

High Quality And After-Sales Service: Cerycose Jigsaw compatible with Dewalt Battery, ensuring seamless performance. Built to high standards, this jigsaw delivers exceptional durability and reliability. Priced competitively, it offers excellent value for money while maintaining high quality. Cerycose offers excellent after-sales service. If you have any questions, our staff will be more than happy to assist you at any time. This is also the perfect gift for male friends who value precision, power, and affordability

name: BLACK+DECKER 20V MAX* POWERCONNECT Cordless Jig Saw (BDCJS20C)
short_description: VERSATILE USE – Make straight, curved, angled, and plunged cuts, even during detailed applications.
VARIABLE-SPEED TRIGGER – Cut up to 2,500 rpm for enhanced control over every job.
TOOL-FREE BLADE CHANGES – Quickly swap out both U and T shank blades without extra tools.
45-DEGREE BEVEL SHOE – For angled cuts in both directions.
WIRE GUARD – Provides a clear line of sight for precise cuts.
BUILT-IN DUST BLOWER – Helps keep the worksurface clear of sawdust and debris for enhanced visibility.
POWERCONNECT BATTERY SYSTEM – Interchangeable battery system means you can use one battery for multiple different tools.
INCLUDES – (1) BDCJS20 jig saw, (1) jig saw blade, (1) 20V MAX* POWERCONNECT battery, (1) charger.
product_description: A must-have for every tool collection, the BLACK+DECKER 20V MAX* POWERCONNECT cordless jig saw makes straight, curved, angled, and plunged cuts in wood and metal. Use the variable-speed trigger for custom control and an output of up to 2,500 rpm. You can swap out blades between jobs without needing extra tools. This cordless jig saw also features a bevel shoe with an angle capacity of up to 45 degrees in both directions. Plus, it’s designed with a wire guard, so you'll have a clear line of sight when making precision cuts. The built-in dust blower helps keep your work surface clear of sawdust for enhanced visibility. And this cordless jig saw is powered by a 20V MAX* POWERCONNECT battery, which is rechargeable and can be used with other compatible tools in the POWERCONNECT system. *Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a workload) is 20 volts. Nominal voltage is 18 volts.

name: BOSCH Top-Handle Jig Saw 7.0 Amp, 3,100 SPM, 45 Degree Beveled Cuts, Variable-Speed Control, Ergonomic Design, Corded (JS470E)
short_description: ERGONOMIC TOP-HANDLE: soft-grip areas supply a solid, comfortable grip
CONVENIENT: featuring a tool-less blade change system and fast insertion with a blade ejection lever that eliminates need to touch hot saw blade
4-IN-1: 4 orbital action tool settings provide different blade strokes for smooth to aggressive cuts for taking on the toughest cutting tasks
CONTROL: variable speed dial sets maximum speed and accelerator trigger controls operating speed; Features an ambidextrous lock on button for steadiness and user comfor
SECURE: includes a large, sturdy die cast foot with steel insert and on board bevel wrench; multidirectional blade clamp delivers superior grip of T-shank blades
ACCURACY: internal precision machined plunging system and low vibration design enhances accuracy and allows for the smooth jigsaw operation in a variety of jobs
INCLUDES: jig saw, (1) non-marring overshoe, (1) anti-splinter insert, (1) T-shank blade, (1) bevel wrench and a carrying case
product_description: BOSCH introduces another essential and practical piece for your power tools Collection with our JS470E cordless top handle Jigsaw with 120V low vibration, 7.0 Amp variable speed for smooth cutting up to 5 7/8" Inch on wood, 3/8" Inch on steel. Perfect for countertop installation, woodworking, Countertop cut outs, furniture building, professional woodworkers, and DIY projects. Our jigsaw has several premium and useful features: Tool less blade change system ambidextrous lock on button variable speed dial Large, sturdy die cast foot with steel Insert exclusive multi directional blade clamp internal precision control constant response circuitry 4 in 1 orbital action settings adjustable dust blower ergonomic top handle, includes a non-marring overshoe anti-splinter insert blade bevel wrench carrying case Our woodworking tools have lightweight handling and accuracy. The variable speed dial sets maximum speed and Accelerator trigger controls operating speed. Features an ambidextrous lock on button for steadiness and user comfort. The precision machined plunging system and low vibration design enhances accuracy and allows for the smooth jig saw operation in a variety of jobs. The unit includes one (1) jig saw, one (1) blade, (1) anti-splinter insert, one (1) plastic overshoe, one (1) bevel wrench, and one (1) carrying case. Feel relaxed during jobs as we've thought through all the details. Our JS470E Jigsaw is top amp rated, having a prevailing 7.0 Amp motor. In addition, the no load SMP ranges from 500 to 3, 100 and has up to 60 hertz. Combine power and flexibility with four orbital action tool settings. Enjoy different blade strokes for smooth cuts on the toughest cutting tasks.
